content.content: Hey all, Similar to the debt auctions, there is now a simple UI available that permits you to easily track and participate in Maker Surplus Auctions in real-time!  https://auctions.makerdao.com/flap The UI has limited functionality and is intended solely as an interim interface to bridge the period between now and when the ecosystem bootstraps a better solution. An open invitation to community developers This UI is an example of a front-end implementation of the three different auction types in the Maker Protocol.  It also serves as an open-source template for builders in the ecosystem interested in developing an improved version yourself! Also, please submit bug reports and improvement contributions towards the code and UX. There are good first contribution opportunities in this project for developers to get their feet wet contributing to the Maker Protocol, especially as a front-end developer. You can find the project repositories below: Front-end    GitHub    makerdao/auctions-ui Front-end for Maker Auctions. Contribute to makerdao/auctions-ui development by creating an account on GitHub.      Indexing/Caching API    GitHub    makerdao/flap-auctions-api Contribute to makerdao/flap-auctions-api development by creating an account on GitHub.
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
